subject: British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Sergio García maintained his lead in the second round of the British Open Friday as Tiger Woods’s shaky play set him back and Phil Mickelson was sure to miss the cut again at a major.
snippet: Sergio García maintained his lead in the second round of the British Open Friday as Tiger Woods’s shaky play set him back and Phil Mickelson was sure to miss the cut again at a major.
